content:
US Secretary of Defense Lloyd Austin went to Europe to hold the 20th meeting of the Contact Group on Defense of Ukraine, which will be held on March 19 at Ramstein Airborne in Germany.

About this head of the PentagonReportedon his Twitter.

I am headed back to Ramstein, Germany to convene the 20th meeting of the Ukraine Defense Contact Group.

Our coalition of some 50 nations will continue to stand together to support Ukraine’s immediate battlefield needs and long-term security.pic.twitter.com/cagxdBUAS6

— Secretary of Defense Lloyd J. Austin III (@SecDef)March 18, 2024

“I return to Ramstin, Germany to convene the 20th meeting of the Contact Group on Defense of Ukraine. Our coalition, consisting of about 50 countries, will continue to unite to support Ukraine's urgent needs on the battlefield and long -term security, ”he stressed.

As reported by the Armyinform, Pentagon is officiallyannouncedLloyd Austin's visit to Germany for Ramstein-20.
title: Lloyd Austin went to Ramstein's meeting with Germany
description: The head of the Pentagon announced this on his Twitter.    I am headed back to Ramstein,...
author: Army Inform
